content: Christmas tree decorating, you are. Star Wars super-fan, you have been. Cat ate last year’s Han Solo topper, he did. Yoda Christmas tree topper will bring great honor and Jedi power to your white pine, it will. Shut up and take my money, you must.

Give your beer a manly look to it while keeping it insulated with these beard drink koozies. Perfect for keeping your brewski ice cold, the hand made beard koozie features a rugged exterior designed with crafting fur and fastened elastic.

titleEN: Glow In The Dark Shot Glasses
content: Give your party a trippy edge to it with these glow in the dark shot glasses. Ideal for black light parties, each package comes with four brightly glowing colors. The glow in the dark shot glasses are easily activated with their built in slammer activator disc.

Satisfy your lust for zombie paraphernalia with this zombie hand goblet. This hand painted 7 ounce piece will make you feel like a zombie’s rotting hand is coming for your face everytime you take a sip or whenever you go to check the legs on your wine.

Just because you’re outdoors and don’t have an electrical doesn’t mean you can’t charge your electronic devices. With just a little bit of wood to burn, this camp stove power charger gives you a fine camp fire while also giving power to your electrical devices.

Record all of your underwater adventures with the camera snorkel mask. Capable of recording at depths up to 15 feet, this high quality photo and video taking snorkel camera will work great for capturing your snorkeling trips on your tropical vacations.

Bathrooms are disgusting breeding pools of bacteria – but now at least you can keep your hands nice and clean after washing them if your bathroom has one of these genius door toe pulls. Instead of using your clean hands, just grab and pull open the door with your foot!

The Corona neon light ensures that it’s always Corona time in your man cave or in your dorm room. Need a retreat from the stresses of life, or the feeling of the breeze blowing through your hair? Just close your eyes and pretend, though sexy bikini ladies are not guaranteed.

Even if you’re not rich, you can pretend you are by carrying around the gold bar USB drive. You’ll be able to convince your co-workers that you’re just so fly that you have your very own gold bar directly from the mint. And you can store documents on it too!

Cruise through the airport with the luggage scooter. No longer must you make it to your plane late and find it is already boarding and you’ve lost any chance of finding a place to put your luggage. Now with the luggage scooter you’ll get to your plane in record time.

Ensure you always look fresh to death with this giant sunglasses mirror. While other mirrors will show you a boring reflection of yourself, the giant sunglasses mirror offers you a rock star reflection of yourself, so you check yourself out like the true <del>douche bag</del> party boy you are.

Throw out those bulky and cumbersome picnic baskets and get serious about your picnicking. The picnic backpack makes carrying your food, cups, eating utensils, and other various items a breeze with its seemingly endless amount of storage compartments.

Give your book collection a unique touch with this book clock. Designed to look like three colorful books standing next to each other, this clever clock will inconspicuously fit right in on your book shelf, and makes a great house warming gift idea.

Keep those savory potato chips from going stale with this clever potato chip bag re-sealer. Perfect for keeping ants out and for locking in freshness, the bag re-sealer works in seconds and is especially great for bigger bags that are bought in bulk.

If you hate cleaning aquariums but hate having dead fish floating around even more, than you need a self cleaning aquarium. This innovative small aquarium takes just seconds to clean – simply pour fresh water in and let the old dirty water pour out.

Get in the spirit of gluttony and awkward family get togethers with this cute turkey hat. Available in both baby and adult sizes, these turkey hats are the festive way to celebrate Thanksgiving, without the pain and suffering of putting an actual turkey carcass on your head.

After a grueling nine months spent in solitary confinement locked up in your womb, your baby emerges and finds it hard to adjust to the free world. Help your baby feel a bit more at home with this orange jumpsuit style prison sentence onesie. Prison shank sold separately.

Attacks happen when you least expect it – now you can always be prepared to defend yourself with this self defense shoelace insert. This potentially life saving self defense tool is made from a high impact plastic, giving your foot strikes a more powerful but non-lethal blow.

Why so shivery?! With the Joker snuggie style blanket you can keep warm this winter while also creating chaos and pandemonium in your home. Just remember that a Batman snuggie blanket wearer is never far away, and will stop at nothing to foil your plans.

Make sure that you never get your keys mixed up again by assigning them each a terrifying zombie key cover face. You’ll know the blue zombie with blood dripping out of her mouth is for the office, and that the green zombie with a hole in his head is for home.

Do reconnaissance with military like precision with this radio control spy plane. Featuring a built in camera that transmits the video feed directly to your controller so you can get a first person flying view of what the R/C spy plane is recording.

Never miss your mark in the middle of the night with these toilet illuminating strips. These clever strips glow in the dark so your late night trips to the toilet don’t end in a nasty mess thanks to your poor aim and bad vision. You’re welcome, men.

En garde! Now you can go to have duels with popsicles thanks to this clever sword popsicle ice tray. Featuring five different sword types, from scimitars to broad swords to sabres, the sword popsicle ice tray will have something for everyone.

Construct your favorite droid from Star Wars in LEGO form with this 2000+ piece LEGO R2-D2 kit. Designed for more advanced LEGO builders, this over-sized LEGO R2-D2 stands a mighty foot tall when completed, and is an excellent gift idea for Star Wars and LEGO fans.

Mixing the perfect drink is a fine art — but that doesn’t mean that mixing and pouring shouldn’t be easy and fun. With the electronic cocktail mixer and pourer, you can mix perfectly at the touch of a button and then dispense your drink into a glass. Just be sure to aim well.

Pay tribute to one of the greatest outcasts in all of cinema, Sloth Fratelli. Misunderstood, heroic, and kind — he’s Chunk’s savior and part of the reason the Goonies are able to escape. When you put this mask on, cravings for Rocky Road ice cream and Baby Ruths are possible.

Don’t let those old zombie corpses lying around in your backyard go to waste – now you can put them to goo use as bird feeders! With the hanging zombie bird feeder, you can keep your backyard buzzing with live as birds will flock to eat out of the zombie’s corpse.

Na na na na na na na na na na BATMAN! Now your children can look like their favorite caped crusader with this kid’s Batman rain coat. The perfect accessory for rain or shine, the Batman rain coat will give your child the rain protection he deserves, but not the one he needs.

Make every piece of lasagna extra tasty with the endless edges lasagna pan. The best part of lasagna is the crispity crunchy cheesy edge – no one wants the pieces in the middle and they always go to waste – so make sure you don’t waste any food with this clever lasagna pan.

With the economy in the dumps, the knights of the round table decided to take whatever jobs they could find. The knight toilet paper holder will perform his dooty without question and will make sure your royal bottom is patted dry like only a high knight can.

titleEN: Shit Out Of Luck Survival Tool
content: When a virus destroys the human race, you’ll need a survival kit you can trust. The shit out of luck tool has it all — a knife for skinning squirrels, an LED flashlight for distracting pod people, and a fire starter to ward off rabid wolves.

Crusty and soda stained keyboards are now a thing of the past thanks to the washable keyboard from Logitech. This water proof and washable keyboard features a durable design that is perfect for those messy computer sessions.

Give your pool some neat lighting with these jellyfish pool lights. Available in both green and purple colors, these life size LED jellyfish will float in your pool, spa, or pond, and provide a soft light that illuminates through the body and down to the tentacles.

Living out of your car has never looked so comfortable and luxurious as it does now thanks to the inflatable car bed! Able to be set up in seconds, the inflatable car bed is perfect for road trips, or just for living in a van down by the river after you’ve lost everything.

Some people say the undead are worthless – but others have found ways to make them useful, such as turning them into bottle openers. The zombie bottle opener will easily pop open some cold ones, though the virus may spread to your drink.

Train your fish to become the next Pelé with this goldfish soccer game. Included in this unique fish training kit – yes, fish can be trained! – is a variety of cool things to interact with such as a soccer goal, and it even comes with a 45 minute training DVD.

Now you can literally talk to the hand with these Bluetooth phone handset gloves. These gloves feature an earpiece in the thumb and a microphone in the pinky, and are guaranteed to make you look like a crazy person while using it in public.

Having a knife on you is always a handy thing to have, and now you can easily carry a small knife with your keys with this key shaped knife. This small fold out knife looks just like a regular key, and will attach to any key chain without feeling bulky.

Throw out that scrawny toilet paper holder and get yourself a jacked up strong man that can hold two rolls of TP at the same time! Available in both black and red colors, this aluminum strong man toilet paper holder makes an excellent gift idea for body builders.

Quit trying to serve guests your nasty balls at your BBQ – now you can whip up some meatballs grilled to perfection with this clever BBQ meatball grilling basket. The basket is capable of holding up to 12 meatballs at once, so you can have a delicious dozen ready fast.

Your dog might be a pure-breed, but with this Triceratops dog costume you can turn your best friend into a head turning dinosaur-dog. Available in a variety of sizes for dogs of all sizes, the Triceratops dog costume is perfect for giving an intimidating look to your canine.

You can’t start a revolution without having an awesome outfit for your comrades. With the Guy Fawkes mask you can strike fear into The Machine™ and show off your lack of originality for your cause. Though it also makes a great gift idea for V for Vendetta fans.

No crime fighter should be without the proper outfit – now you can clean up this crime riddled country with the Captain America hoodie. This officially licensed and super comfy hoodie is a true patriot’s outfit, and will you get more chicks than a three wolf moon t-shirt ever will.

Score a touchdown with your house guests while you watch the big game with this football salami. The perfect food for a Superbowl party, or just a regular Sunday football watching, this edible football is made from hickory smoked and award winning salami.

Tackle a wide variety of jobs with this flexible flashlight that can be adjusted to provide adequate lighting in countless environments or situations. The flexible flashlight – known as the Gorillatorch – features magnetic feet and flexing legs, so it can be setup anywhere.

Keep your outdoor dogs hydrated even if you aren’t around with this auto refilling dog bowl. This clever water bowl connects to any standard size garden hose, making it easy to setup so you can keep any outdoor dog or cat properly supplied with water.

Don’t run the risk of being without clean drinking water when a disaster strikes. This water purifying straw – a.k.a. the LifeStraw – is a revolutionary survival tool that can filter over 250 gallons of water, making practically any water source safe to drink.

Freddy Krueger is back in town, and his dream entering restraining order on your kids has been dropped! This scary Freddy Krueger glove is the perfect accessory for a devilish costume, or continuing the handy-work of the infamous Mr. Krueger.

Take a little cap nap with this Totoro cat bed that also functions as a sleeping bag. Inspired by the My Neighbor Totoro Japanese anime film, this over-sized cat bed/sleeping bag is available in two sizes, and is a perfect gift idea for anime geeks.

Turn your iPhone into a truly professional work phone with this iPhone landline dock. With crisp sound quality from the headset and the ability to charge your iPhone while it’s plugged in, the iPhone landline dock is perfect for transitioning in and out of work mode.

Now you can have one of the Empire’s most iconic assault vehicles to be your personal book keeper with these Star Wars AT-AT bookends. These geeky bookends are cast in polystone and hand painted for a truly detailed look, and make a great gift idea for Star Wars fans.

Create your own mini Google Maps app in real life with these arrow push pins. This cute set of 12 arrow push pins is perfect for plotting your plans for world domination, or possibly just making a cool map of all of the crazy places you have travelled to.

Ever wonder what Mr. Fluffums would look like while wearing a dress or red flanel jacket? Wonder no more, with these animal clothes hangers you can keep your clothes hanging nice and tidy in your closet while also giving them an awesome cat or dog head.

Don’t let a Waterworld like post-apocalyptic event stop you from getting a game on ping pong going – now you can play this fun game anywhere with the floating ping pong table. It’s the perfect playing board for hot summers or after a massive flood.

Stop dirtying up your SUV when you load it up with debris and trash. With the cargo liner you can easily fill your vehicle with <del>dead bodies</del> stuff without it making a mess afterwards, making it perfect for <del>mobsters</del> hauling trash to the <del>Hudson river</del> landfill.

Now you can gulp down 200 CCs of doctor recommended Boozemin and look like a medically prescribed drunk with this booze prescription flask. Capable of holding 7 ounces of alcohol, this novelty prescription flask makes a great gift idea for doctors.

Bake up some spooky cookies this Halloween with these clever dead gingerbread men cookie cutters. After raising your army of undead gingerbread men, you’ll need to eat them all up as quickly as possible, unless you want to unleash your minions on the neighborhood.

You might be tough, but putting out cigars in your own hand is usually not a good idea. But now with these cast iron hand ashtrays you can maintain your rugged style of cigar extinguishing while keeping your hands out of harms way.

Now you can make a fun game out of your verbally abusive family members with this carnival dunk tank. Simply place the insulting person into the carnival dunk tank, and use his/her morally crushing words to fuel your angry ball pitching.

Stop wasting your money at the overpriced theaters – now you can waste your money on this overpriced backyard theater system and keep your neighbors entertained all the while! This massive 16′ x 9′ theater system is perfect for block parties and concerts.

Now you can keep your hipster cred without permanently desecrating your body with some trendy tattoo thanks to these fingerstache temporary tattoos. If you don’t take our advice, in 10 years you’ll be like the guy with the tribal tattoos that everyone secretly laughs at.

Now you can combine Halloween with Christmas and celebrate these joyous holidays for two months straight with this Nightmare Before Christmas lamp. Featuring the head of Jack from the classic Tim Burton movie, it will be a great decoration for both holidays.

Train your dog to stop pulling on the leash when you walk with this tug preventing dog trainer. Every time old Sparky pulls on the leash, this clever device will emit a harmless ultrasonic tone that only the he can hear, encouraging him to stop pulling and tugging.

Throw away your slutty Halloween costumes, because this year you’re going to bring the true Halloween spirit back with this zipper face makeup kit. This incredibly disturbing zipper makeup kit features everything you need to create this intense look for Halloween.

Dork out on a whole new level with these pencil socks. These geeky and eye catching yellow No. 2 pencil socks are perfect for a back to school outfit, or even a nerdy Halloween costume. These socks also go great with the white ruled paper notebook sock style.

Salvage your old credit cards, IDs, and other hard plastic cards by turning them into guitar picks. This hole puncher can convert almost anything into a standard 351 shape guitar pick, making it a great gift for musicians who like to personalize their equipment.

Stop eating corn with your hands like a caveman – now you can easily strip off the delicious corn kernels and have a tasty side dish ready to eat with this genius corn kernel shaver. Just run the shaver down a piece of corn cob, and drop the kernels onto a plate.

Listen to your music while lounging by the pool with this floating wireless speaker. Using a high powered 900 MHz signal, the floating wireless speaker can deliver high quality sound from a long distance, and can be synched up with other floating wireless speakers.

Keep your gutters from getting clogged up with leafs and other messy debris with this clever gutter filter wedge. Available as a two pack, these gutter filters will work in most standard sized home gutters, and are a great gift for a house warming party.

Get yourself wasted in less than 12 parsecs with this geeky Star Wars Millennium Falcon bottle opener. Perfect for any cantina, the Millennium Falcon bottle opener features a metal framed body with a convenient magnet placed on the back of it.

Now your garbage can go sleep with the fishes thanks to these goldfish garbage bags. Featuring little goldfish scattered throughout, these cute trash bags will make the boring task of tossing out the trash at least somewhat enjoyable.

Exercising underwater is a great workout – and now you can get a killer upper body workout while in the water with these aquatic dumbbells. These clever dumbbells soak up the water, increasing the underwater resistance so you can get ripped and tan at the same time.

If you’ve got a tight butthole, then you need to get yourself a bear coat. This amazing bear coat is styled after the glorious coat worn by Blake from Workaholics, giving you a straight grizzly look while also keeping you warm during long hours in that cold cubicle space.

Now you can listen to your records like never before with this wall mounted turn table. Perfect for compact rooms, this vertical record player is battery powered and has a speaker on-board so it can be used in practically any area of your home.

Frighten and intrigue everyone around you with this creepy horse head mask. This realistic latex mask is perfect for costume parties, first dates, or even job interviews where you want to make a bold first impression to your potential boss and co-workers.

Sometimes the weight of knowledge contained in a book can crush a man, but sometimes just the weight of a book can literally crush a man as seen with this clever falling bookends that display a tiny man about to be obliterated by the falling books.

Put your air guitar and face melting shredding skills to good use with this guitar cheese shredder. Perfect for the musician who loves to cook, the guitar cheese shredder comes in either Devil worshiper black or panty dropper red.

Now you can combine your love of arts and crafts with zombies with this customizable zombie creation kit. Included in this zombie action figure kit are ragged clothing and an assortment of body parts that range from “just bitten” to full on zombie carcass.

Your baby might not be able to grow a full mustache yet, but that is no excuse for leaving his upper lip exposed to the harsh elements. Now, with the mustache pacifier you can give your baby a bold and distinguished look so all the other newborns will fear and respect him.

Military men and women are tough – but these Army Men gummy worms are soft, chewy, and taste delicious! With a green apple flavor and looking like the nostalgic green Army Men plastic toy soldiers we all loved as kids, these gummies will easily be your favorite candy.

Don’t risk cleaning your face with a nasty soap bar that has graced the nether regions of your fellow shower users – now with the butt and face soap bars you’ll always know you’re using the appropriate soap bar. Just watch out for trolls who will intentionally use them wrong.

Do some real life Mario Kart racing with this Yoshi radio control Mario Kart! This 1/8th scale Yoshi racer is apart of the Mario Kart R/C collection and comes equipped with a 9.6 volt battery so it can tear up the local tracks and quickly be recharged.

After countless Darwin awards were awarded last year for mixing electricity with water, someone finally decided to do something about it. These water resistant power strips are designed with a protective material that minimizes electricity flow when placed in water.

Work on your swing at home or even in your office with the personal golf driving range. Designed for both casual and professional golfers, the personal driving range offers an automatic golf ball return and can be set up in a matter of minutes.

Quit struggling to start a barbeque using conventional methods – the instant charcoal lighter can get a fire going fast and reliably without need for lighter fluids. The instant lighter also works great for campfires and fireplace logs.

Now you can turn a regular game of Foosball into an epic game of teeth rotting fun with this Foosball gumball table. After each goal, the gumball will drop down and can be consumed by either the victor or loser, depending on your preference.

Quit making those sloppy cuts with your normal scissors – now you can cut stuff up with laser like precision thanks to these laser guided scissors! These scissors are perfect for arts and crafts, gift wrapping, scrap booking, and even cutting hair.

Keep it old school while still looking lady like with these Converse style wedge heels. Available in a variety of eye catching colors, these three inch wedge heels are perfect for casual nights where you stay in or party it up at the clubs on the weekend.

Stop drinking with those sissy plastic straws – you’re a grown ass man and now you can drink like one too with the metal drinking straw. This titanium drinking straw is so tough you might even find it beating up those wimpy straws in the pantry cabinet when you aren’t looking.

Crack open a cold one with the most useful tool in your home – with the bottle opener remote control you can easily transition from popping open a six pack of imported nectar of the gods to changing the channel in seconds to that enthralling Honey Boo Boo TV show.

Now you can truly never disconnect from the internet and social networks even when you need to shower thanks to this Facebook profile shower curtain. Best of all, this geeky shower curtain features the older profile style, before Facebook “improved” it with the timeline.

Enchant an audience with your skillful pianist abilities while on the go with this portable roll up piano. Perfect for setting up an impromptu piano concert, the roll up piano is light weight and makes a great gift idea for the traveling musician.

Add some festive lighting during Thanksgiving with these Indian corn candles. Available in both garnet and yellow color styles, these hand made Indian corn candles are wrapped in real corn husks, and will add some real character to any Holiday dinner.

Quit struggling to watch Netflix on that small iPhone screen, because now you can watch full size TV and movies on the go with this portable iPhone movie projector. Simply connect it to your iPhone, and enjoy a crisp 60-inch media projection on any smooth surface.

I mustache you a question, who said tie clips need to be a boring clothing accessory? Now you can compliment your bold facial hair with a mustache tie clip. Available in gunmetal and silver, there’s no better way to boost your manliness than with this mustache tie clip.

Play all the classics from the golden age of Nintendo with nostalgic realism with this classic Nintendo USB controller. The iconic two button controller is perfect for playing Super Mario, Legend of Zelda, Metroid, and other Nintendo franchise games emulated on your PC.

Never go to a barbeque without packing heat – these eye catching condiment dispenser guns will show everyone that you don’t mess around when it comes time to dispense ketchup and mustard. These plastic guns are easily washed and come with two re-usable cartridges.

You’ll never break the world record for biggest poop dropped if you don’t have the tools to measure your chocolate masterpieces. Now with the measuring tape toilet paper, you can prove to the world that you unload the biggest toilet bombs known to man.

Keep your precious fingers out of harm’s way when you are slicing and dicing with these knife cutting finger protectors. The finger protector is great while teaching kids how to cook, but will prove to be an invaluable tool for chefs of all ages and skill levels.

Just because you’re a workaholic doesn’t mean you can’t the have time to exercise properly and stay in shape. Now with the treadmill desk workstation you keep your buns tight and your heart healthy all while staying productive at your computer work area.
